snippet: The decisions came on the final day of a meeting of signatories of the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species and were welcomed by conservationists.
abstract: Meeting of Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species, or Cites, concludes with final decisions to extend protections for dozens of animal and plant species that have come under severe pressure from soaring demand and overfishing.
lead_paragraph: The decisions came on the final day of a meeting of signatories of the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species and were welcomed by conservationists.

headline.seo: Dozens of Species Given New Trade Protections
headline.main: Dozens of Species Given New Trade Protections
headline.print_headline: Trade Protections Aid Dozens of Species

keywords.value: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species
keywords.name: organizations
